Disabled_Description: Setting to true disables the module
AllowAppRegisterMailto_Description: Enables setting the product installation as mailto: links handler
AllowChangeInputDirection_Description: Enables switching between RTL and LTR input directions
FoldersExpandedByDefault_Description: If true, email folders hierarchy is displayed fully expanded by default, collapsed otherwise
AllowSpamFolder_Description: Enables the use of Spam folder and moving messages from/to Spam with a button
AllowAddNewFolderOnMainScreen_Descriptio: If true, New Folder button is added on mail screen
ComposeToolbarOrder_Description: Defines list of controls shown on compose toolbar in their order from left to right
DefaultFontName_Description: Font name used by default when composing email message
DefaultFontSize_Description: Font size used by default when composing email message
AlwaysTryUseImageWhilePasting_Descriptio: If true, complex content like tables will be pasted as image by default
AllowHorizontalLineButton_Description: If true, Insert Horizontal Line button is added to compose toolbar
JoinReplyPrefixes_Description: If true, multiple prefixes such as Re: or Fwd: will be merged as much as possible when composing a new reply/forward
MailsPerPage_Description: Default number of mail messages displayed per page
MaxMessagesBodiesSizeToPrefetch_Descript: Sets a limit of message bodies to be prefetched, in bytes
MessageBodyTruncationThreshold_Descripti: Sets a limit for message body size to be fetched
ShowEmailAsTabName_Description: If true, email address will be shown instead of Mail screen tab name
AllowOtherModulesToReplaceTabsbarHeader_: If set to true, other modules can supply custom HeaderItemView template instead of default one of this module
AllowShowMessagesCountInFolderList_Descr: If true, number of messages will be displayed for all folders in the list
AllowSearchMessagesBySubject_Description: Enables the feature of searching for text selection in Subject area of preview pane
AllowHorizontalLayout_Description: If true, users are able to switch betwee vertical and horizontal layouts of mail screen
HorizontalLayoutByDefault_Description: If true, horizontal layout is used on mail screen by default
DisableRtlRendering_Description: If set to true, messages are always displayed in left-to-right view, regarldess of their content
AllowQuickReply_Description: If true, a quick reply pane is available under message preview
AllowQuickSendOnCompose_Description: Enables Ctrl-Enter shortcut for sending mail out
AllowUserGroupsInComposeAutocomplete_Des: If true, user groups become available in address autocompletion when composing a message
MarkMessageSeenWhenViewing_Description: If true, message automatically becomes read when viewed by selecting it in message list
MarkMessageSeenWhenAnswerForward_Descrip: If true, message becomes read when forwarded or replied to
UserLoginPartInAccountDropdown_Descripti: If set to true, only username is displayed in account dropdown, instead of full email address
UseMeRecipientForMessages_Description: If true, 'me' will be displayed instead of user's email address in headers section of message preview pane (collapsed view only)
